Trim | San Francisco | Full-Stack Engineer | Onsite

Trim (https://www.asktrim.com) is the largest and fastest-growing AI assistant for your personal finances.

Trim analyzes your transaction data to find ways to save you money -- such as cancelling old subscriptions, contesting overdraft fees, and negotiating utility bills. In our first year we've saved Americans more than $6M.

We're hiring #6: a fullstack software engineer who wants to create tangible value for a rapidly growing number of consumers. Stack: Rails, React, Postgres. Full start-up benefits, including significant equity. Our office is in the Mission.

If you're interested please email me directly: thomas at asktrim.com.
